TOAST.EXISTS: The user is already in the system. If you are on a Project page, we will add them to the project for you.
TOAST.INVITED: An invite has been sent to the user.
TOAST.ACTIVATION_SUCCESS: Your account has been activated. You will be redirected to the login page.

ERROR.DUPLICATE: Attempted to enter a duplicate value. Please enter a unique value instead.
ERROR.SERVER_ISSUE: The server seems to be having some issues or is down. Please try again later.
ERROR.INVALID_LOGIN: We weren't able to find your username or password.
ERROR.FETCH_PROFILE: Something has gone wrong and we couldn't obtain the user's information. Please try again later.
ERROR.FETCH_USERS: Something has gone wrong and we couldn't obtain the list of users for this organization. Please try again later.
ERROR.FETCH_TASKS: Fetch tasks failed... or the user simply has no assigned tasks.
ERROR.CREATE_SURVEY: Please create a survey before assigning tasks.
ERROR.PROJECT_REQUEST: The system failed to insert the new project into the database. Please try again.
ERROR.SURVEY_REQUEST: The system failed to insert or update a survey into the database. Please try again
ERROR.ANSWER_REQUEST: The system failed to handle an answer request.
ERROR.DISCUSS_REQUEST: The system failed to make any kind of update to discussions.
ERROR.GROUP_DELETE: The system failed to delete the user group.
ERROR.SUBJECT_REQUEST: Something has gone wrong with subject(s) insertion or deletion. Please try again.
ERROR.PROFILE_REQUEST: Failed to insert or delete profile request.
ERROR.USER_REQUEST: Failed to insert or delete user.
ERROR.TASK_REQUEST: Failed to insert or delete task.
ERROR.USER_GROUP: The system failed to assign users to the group.
ERROR.GROUP_REQUEST: The (re)assignment of the user groups to this stage has failed. Please try again.
ERROR.STAGE_REQUEST: Something has gone wrong with stage request. Please try again.
ERROR.MAX_STAGES: You can add up to 4 stages during set-up. Complete project to add stages from workflow
ERROR.SUBJECT_NEED: You've added a stage, but you need to add a subject to see the matrix.
ERROR.STAGE_NEED: You've added a subject, but you need to add a stage to see it.
ERROR.ALREADY_TOP: The question is already at the very top of the section.
ERROR.ALREADY_BOTTOM: The question is already at the very bottom of the section.
ERROR.NO_DELETE_SUBJECT_WITH_DATA: This subject already has data collected and cannot be deleted.
ERROR.NO_DELETE_USER_GROUP_WITH_STAGES: This user group is currently assigned to one or more workflow stages and may not be deleted.
ERROR.NOTIFY_FAILURE: The system was unable to notify the user of this action
ERROR.FLAGGED_QUESTIONS: You cannot complete a task if there are flagged questions awaiting resolution.
ERROR.INVALID_TOKEN: The activation token is invalid. Your account has not been activated
ERROR.PASSWORD_REQUIRED: A password is required. Your account has not been activated
ERROR.ACTIVATION_FAILURE: An error occurred and your account has not been activated
ERROR.MIN_MAX_INVALID: The minimum cannot be greater than the maximum for a scale type question.
ERROR.REQUIRE_FLAG_USER: You must specify a user to receive a flag notification.
ERROR.SECTION_MINIMUM: Each survey must have a minimum of one section.
ERROR.EMPTY_TEXT: Please enter text into the field.

PASSWORD.INSTRUCTIONS: If you cannot remember your password, click the 'Reset Password Button. You will receive an email with instructions to reset your password.

OPTIONS_MODAL.TITLE: Task Options
OPTIONS_MODAL.FORCE_PARAGRAPH: Force complete to push the survey to the next stage. The person assigned to the next stage cannot start that task until its specified start date. To edit the start date of the next step, click on the date of the task cell.
OPTIONS_MODAL.REASSIGN: Reassign (Does not apply if task is force completed.)
OPTIONS_MODAL.SKIP: Skip stage and leave as unassigned.
OPTIONS_MODAL.SKIP_PARAGRAPH: Skipping a stage will not affect the survey in any way. The task will be left as unassigned.
OPTIONS_MODAL.NOTIFY: Notify User. (User will receive default message unless changed.)
OPTIONS_MODAL.NOTIFY_MESSAGE: Your task has been forced to the next step. If you have questions, contact the project manager.

PROJECT.TITLE: Title
PROJECT.SUBJECT: Subject
PROJECT.NOTIFY_USER: Notify user to respond to flag
PROJECT.INSTRUCTIONS_EXPLAINED: Please complete the following questions to reflect your opinion as accurately as possible. The form will autosave as questions are completed. If requested, publication data can be filled out after answering.
DESC_ARRAY: View previous user's survey answers and leave comments
View and edit survey answers and comments
PROJECT.START_DATE: Start Date (Stage is unavailable until this date)
PROJECT.END_DATE: End Date (Stage is unavailable after this date)
PROJECT.STAGE_TITLE_INSTRUCTION: Enter a stage title. Try Fill Out Survey or Review Stage
PROJECT.PERMISSIONS: Stage Activities (Actions the user can take on the survey)
PROJECT.DND_INSTRUCTIONS: Drag the users below over the workflow matrix to assign them a task. You cannot assign a user to a previously assigned task, nor can you assign to users outside a stage's groups.
PROJECT.ADD_SUBJECT_INSTRUCTION: Add survey subjects or use the import manager to add subjects from a previous project.
PROJECT.ADD_SUBJECT_CLARIFICATION: Subjects are units of analysis. For example, cities, programs, or companies. Separate subjects with a comma. Press Enter to submit.
PROJECT.ADD_USERS_CLARIFICATION_1: Enter users name and email to invite users to a project.
PROJECT.ADD_USERS_CLARIFICATION_2: Create a new Usergroup or search existing. Usergroups are multiple people who share the same role.
PROJECT.ADD_STAGES_CLARIFICATION: Stages are the steps in your project workflow. Click the blank cell to add a new stage.
PROJECT.PROJECT_CREATE_SUCCESS: You Successfully Created A New Project
PROJECT.OPTIONAL_MESSAGE: Optional, only you can see this
PROJECT.NOT_ACCEPTED: The user has not accepted this invitation
PROJECT.WIZARD_COMPLETE: Indaba lets Project Managers determine which users participate in a particular stage. Stage dates ensure users access the survey in the correct order, at the correct time.

SURVEY.PANE_INSTRUCTIONS: Click on a new question to choose a question from a different survey
SURVEY.ENTER_INSTRUCTIONS: Enter instructions for the whole survey here.
SURVEY.AUTHOR: Author
SURVEY.REQUIRED_TOOLTIP: Respondent must answer the question to submit the survey
SURVEY.SUBMIT_INSTRUCTIONS: If you have completed the task, select submit.
SURVEY.SUBMIT_INSTRUCTIONS_3: and finish later. All progress will be saved.
SURVEY.REVIEW_INSTRUCTIONS: Click 'Save Review Progress' if you wish to commit your comments.
SURVEY.BP_ENTERS: And a new text field will appear here.
SURVEY.CHOICE_ENTER: Enter an option for the user to select.
SURVEY.SCALE_ENTER: Please enter a value between these two numbers:
SURVEY.MARK_SENT: This discussions has been marked as resolved.

QUESTIONS_EXPLAINED.CHOICE: The user will select one of the options you enter here.
QUESTIONS_EXPLAINED.BULLET: Additional input lines will appear as the user starts each new entry.
QUESTIONS_EXPLAINED.CHOICES: The user will select one or more of the options you enter here.
QUESTIONS_EXPLAINED.TEXT: The user will simply enter a sentence into a text field.
QUESTIONS_EXPLAINED.DROPDOWN: The user will select an option from those available in the dropdown.
QUESTIONS_EXPLAINED.DATE: The user will enter a date in the provided field.
QUESTIONS_EXPLAINED.INTEGER: The user would enter a whole number.
QUESTIONS_EXPLAINED.SCALE: The user answers a question bounded by one or two values.

USER.NOTES_INTERNAL_MESSAGE: Internal, only you can see this
USER.ACTIVATE_INSTRUCTIONS: Enter your first and last name and choose a password to activate your account

EXPORT.INSTRUCTIONS: Select the quick option to download all project data. Use the custom option to export specific project data. Once selected, confirm options and click the export button.
EXPORT.QUICK_EXPORT_EXPLANATION: Export project data for all subjects and questions, including flags, comments and attached files.
EXPORT.CUSTOM_EXPORT_EXPLANATION: Generates a file based on options selected below.

PROJECT_TAB.TITLE: Change Project Status
PROJECT_TAB.INSTRUCTION_DEACTIVATE: Deactivate the project when you need to make changes to the workflow.
PROJECT_TAB.INSTRUCTION_DRAFT_CONSTRAINT: You can switch the survey to draft mode while the project is inactive.
PROJECT_TAB.INSTRUCTION_REACTIVATE: Reactivate the project once workflow changes have been made and you're ready to notify the user of the change.

ACTIVE.TITLE: Activate the project? Check boxes to confirm.
ACTIVE.CHECKBOX_DRAFT: Survey cannot be switched to draft mode while project is active.
ACTIVE.CHECKBOX_ACCESS: All access to project will be restored.
ACTIVE.CHECKBOX_USERS: All users will be notified of this action.

INACTIVE.TITLE: Deactivate the project? Check boxes to confirm.
INACTIVE.CHECKBOX_DRAFT: Survey can be switched to draft mode while project is inactive.
INACTIVE.CHECKBOX_ACCESS: All access to project will be suspended until activated.
INACTIVE.CHECKBOX_USERS: All users will be notified of this action.

SURVEY_TAB.TITLE: Change Survey Status
SURVEY_TAB.INSTRUCTION_PUBLISH: Publish the survey when you're ready for assignees to access it.
SURVEY_TAB.INSTRUCTION_DRAFT_CONSTRAINT: Once published, you must deactivate the project to edit the survey.
SURVEY_TAB.INSTRUCTION_PROJECT_STATUS: This action does not change the project status.

DRAFT.TITLE: Return survey to Draft? Check boxes to confirm:
DRAFT.CHECKBOX_ACCESS: Surveys must be published in order to activate project.
DRAFT.CHECKBOX_EDIT: You must return survey to Draft mode in order to edit.

PUBLISHED.TITLE: Publish the survey? Check boxes to confirm:
PUBLISHED.CHECKBOX_ACCESS: Surveys must be published in order to activate project.
PUBLISHED.CHECKBOX_EDIT: You must return survey to Draft mode in order to edit.

CREATE_PROJECT.CREATE_INSTRUCTION: Projects can be used to track workflow progress, manage users and collaborate with your team.
CREATE_PROJECT.IMPORT_INSTRUCTION: Use the import manager to import a previous project to edit and customize.

SUBJECT_DELETE_CONFIRM.TITLE: Delete subject?
SUBJECT_DELETE_CONFIRM.SIMPLE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete?
SUBJECT_DELETE_CONFIRM.ASSOCIATED_PROJECT_CONFIRM: This subject is currently associated with one or more projects. Are you sure you want to delete?

USER_DELETE_CONFIRM.TITLE: Remove user?
USER_DELETE_CONFIRM.REMOVE_WITH_DATA: This user has completed tasks in this project. Their progress will be saved but they will no longer be able to access this project.
USER_DELETE_CONFIRM.REMOVE_WITH_TASKS: This user has assigned tasks in the project.
USER_DELETE_CONFIRM.REMOVE_WITH_NOTHING: Are you sure you want to remove this user from this project?
USER_DELETE_CONFIRM.DELETE_WITH_DATA: This user has completed tasks in one or more projects. Their progress will be saved but they will no longer be able to access Indaba.
USER_DELETE_CONFIRM.DELETE_WITH_TASKS: This user has assigned tasks in one or more projects.
USER_DELETE_CONFIRM.DELETE_WITH_NOTHING: Are you sure you want to delete this user?

USER_GROUP_DELETE_CONFIRM.TITLE: Remove user group?
USER_GROUP_DELETE_CONFIRM.DELETE_WITH_NOTHING: Are you sure you want to delete this user group?
USER_GROUP_DELETE_CONFIRM.DELETE_WITH_STAGES: This user group is currently assigned to one or more workflow stages.

STAGE_DELETE_CONFIRM.TITLE: Delete stage?
STAGE_DELETE_CONFIRM.DELETE_NO_DATA: Are you sure you want to delete this stage?
STAGE_DELETE_CONFIRM.NO_DELETE: Data has already been collected in this stage. To prevent additional data being collected in this stage, delete assignments for all incomplete tasks.

SECTION_DELETE_CONFIRM.TITLE: Delete section?
SECTION_DELETE_CONFIRM.DELETE_WARNING: Are you sure you want to delete the entire section? Once you click 'Save Progress,' all questions contained will have to be re-entered.
